trans-unit.source: Represents a security token provider that provides <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.UserNameSecurityToken"></xref> security tokens for a SOAP message sender.

In most instances the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.UserNameSecurityTokenProvider> class doesn't need to be called directly, as it is called when a client sends a SOAP message that requires a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.UserNameSecurityToken> security token.

Specifically, a client specifies the type of security token needed using the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ClientCredentials> class and the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ClientCredentials> class calls the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.GetToken%2A> method to get a security token.

When the security token needed is a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.UserNameSecurityToken> security token, the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.GetToken%2A> method calls the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.UserNameSecurityTokenProvider.GetTokenCore%2A> method.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.UserNameSecurityTokenProvider"></xref> class using the specified username and password.
The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.UserNameSecurityTokenProvider.GetTokenCore%2A> method gets a token based on the specified username and password.
The username to get <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.UserNameSecurityToken"></xref> security token for.
The password of the user to get a <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.UserNameSecurityToken"></xref> security token for.
Gets a security token based on the username and password specified in the constructor.

The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.UserNameSecurityTokenProvider.GetTokenCore%2A> method is called by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ClientCredentials> class when a client sends a SOAP message and an <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.UserNameSecurityToken> security token is needed.
A <xref href="System.TimeSpan"></xref> that specifies the timeout value for the message that gets the security token.
The <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken"></xref> that represents the security token to get.
